EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37.0, y=-85.0)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (39.0,-85.0), and (37.0,-85.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at positions (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5), (36.5,-86.5)
- Burner inserters at (35.5,-86.5) and (35.5,-85.5) for coal movement
- All components working together to mine and store coal

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining at position(x=-28.0, y=-61.0)
Mining setup with:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5)
- Connected to transport belt system
- Mining both iron and copper ore

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-10.0, y=-59.0)
Large iron mining setup with:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Connected transport belt network
- Multiple burner inserters for ore movement

### Smelting Line at position(x=0.0, y=0.0)
Large smelting array consisting of:
- 6 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0), (-27.0,-58.0), (-23.0,-58.0)
- Multiple burner inserters for input/output
- Wooden chests for storage at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Connected transport belt system for material movement

### Power Generation System (Under Construction)
Incomplete power system with:
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Pipe network (currently disconnected)
- Small electric pole network connecting to a lab

ERROR TIPS

### Fluid Connection Errors
- Ensure proper pipe connections between offshore pump, boiler and steam engine
- Verify that pipe segments can reach between connection points before attempting to connect
- Make sure fluid systems are properly aligned and within reach of each other

### Entity Placement and Connection Issues
- Check that entities are properly aligned before attempting to connect them
- Ensure sufficient space between components of the power system
- Verify that connection points are compatible between different fluid-carrying entities

### Power System Setup
- Connect offshore pump to boiler first, then boiler to steam engine
- Ensure proper spacing and alignment of power system components
- Make sure all fluid-carrying entities have valid connection points

### Resource Management
- Empty full chests to prevent production blockages
- Ensure mining drills have fuel to continue operation
- Monitor inserter fuel levels to maintain continuous operation
